title: Did a man from Ohio die from Coved 19 after he threw away the face mask?
subtitle: The tragic death of 37-year-old Richard Rose attracted headlines all over the world in the summer of 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Richard Rose from Port Clinton, Ohio, died from COVID-19 after pledging earlier not to buy a face mask and refusing tips to use face masks as "hebe."
